text:
HA HA HA!
ALEX IS GONNA
LOVE HER ROOM.
THE--THE FLOWERY THINGIES

ARE PERFECT FOR MY
LITTLE PRINCESS.
HEY, CHECK IT OUT.

THE WALLPAPER GLUE
DRIED MY FINGERS
TOGETHER.
HA-HA! HI-YAH!

DUDE, THAT'S AWESOME.
GIVE IT UP.
OHH!

COME ON, GUYS.
STOP MESSING AROUND.
ALL RIGHT?

TO DO THIS JOB RIGHT,
YOU NEED TO FOCUS
YOU NEED INTENSITY...
AND A ROOT BEER.
HI, DADDY.

I LIKE
THE NEW WALLPAPER,

AND I'M GLAD YOU'RE NOT
FINISHED YET,

BECAUSE YOU'RE REALLY
GOING TO LOVE THIS.
PINK FUR WALLPAPER!

UH-OH.
WATCH DADDY'S
LITTLE GIRL

MAKE US PUT UP
HER NEW WALL--FUR.
DON'T YOU LOVE IT?

UH, BUT WHAT ABOUT
THE LITTLE FLOWERS?

THAT'S A LITTLE
YOUNG FOR ME.

I THINK I'M READY
FOR THIS.

YOU KNOW, NOW THAT
I THINK ABOUT IT,

THIS PATTERN DOES
LOOK LIKE MY BOXERS.

I ALMOST DIDN'T
GET THE PINK FUR

BECAUSE THE GUY
AT THE STORE SAID

ONLY A PROFESSIONAL
COULD PUT IT UP,

BUT HE DOESN'T KNOW
MY DAD.

HA HA. WELL,
YOU GOT THAT RIGHT.

THE RUSSO BOYS
ARE ON IT.

WE'RE GOING TO NEED
MORE GLUE.

YEAH, BUT I THOUGHT
WE WERE GONNA WORK
ON MY ROOM NEXT.

YOUR ROOM'S
GOOD ENOUGH.

GOOD ENOUGH FOR
JUSTIN'S ROOM, MAYBE.
NOT FOR THE J-MAN.

WAIT, WHO'S
THE J-MAN?

ME. THAT'S
MY NICKNAME.

YEAH. WHO CALLS
YOU THAT?
LOTS OF PEOPLE.

YOU KNOW,
NOT AT SCHOOL,

BUT AROUND
THE NEIGHBORHOOD.
OK, A COUPLE.
ME, MOSTLY.

BUT THAT'S JUST
WE HAVEN'T REDONE
MY ROOM.
YOUR ROOM LOOKS GREAT.
NO, JUSTIN'S RIGHT.

WE SHOULDN'T
FORGET ABOUT HIM.

THAT'S WHY HE SHOULD
HAVE THIS WALLPAPER.

I'M COMFORTABLE
BEING FORGOTTEN.

IT'LL TOTALLY TIE TOGETHER
YOUR LITTLE ACTION FIGURES

AND THE BIG WATER STAIN
FROM WHERE THE ROOF LEAKED.

I WAS GOING TO PAINT
OVER THAT WATER STAIN,
BUT YOU KNOW WHAT?

NO, YOU'RE RIGHT.
THIS WALLPAPER
WOULD LOOK WAY BETTER.

ATTABOY. COME ON, GUYS,
LET'S GO BEFORE IT DRIES.
LET'S HUSTLE.
FUN AND GAMES ARE OVER.
DAD, I WAS KIDDING.

YOU GOT TO SHOW ME
HOW YOU DO THAT.

UNLESS YOU WANT TO BE
DADDY'S LITTLE GIRL,
I CAN'T HELP YOU.

BUT THAT SHIRT'S
GOT YOU HALFWAY THERE.

♪ WELL, YOU KNOW EVERYTHING'S
GONNA BE A BREEZE ♪

♪ THAT THE END WILL, NO DOUBT,
JUSTIFY THE MEANS ♪

♪ YOU CAN FIX ANY PROBLEM
WITH THE SLIGHTEST OF EASE ♪
♪ YES, PLEASE ♪

♪ BUT YOU MIGHT FIND OUT
IT'LL GO TO YOUR HEAD ♪

♪ WHEN YOU WRITE A REPORT
ON A BOOK YOU NEVER READ ♪

♪ WITH A SNAP OF YOUR FINGERS,
YOU CAN MAKE YOUR BED ♪
♪ THAT'S WHAT I SAID ♪

♪ EVERYTHING
IS NOT WHAT IT SEEMS ♪

♪ WHEN YOU CAN GET
ALL YOU WANTED ♪
♪ IN YOUR WILDEST DREAMS ♪

♪ YOU MIGHT RUN INTO TROUBLE
IF YOU GO TO EXTREMES ♪

♪ BECAUSE EVERYTHING
IS NOT WHAT IT SEEMS ♪

♪ EVERYTHING IS NOT
WHAT IT SEEMS ♪

♪ WHEN YOU CAN HAVE
WHAT YOU WANT ♪
♪ BY THE SIMPLEST OF MEANS ♪

♪ BE CAREFUL NOT TO MESS
WITH THE BALANCE OF THINGS ♪

♪ BECAUSE EVERYTHING
IS NOT WHAT IT SEEMS ♪

CAPTIONING MADE POSSIBLE BY
DISNEY ABC CABLE NETWORKS GROUP

A GIANT BURRITO

OUT OF MAX AGAIN,
DID YOU?

NO, MOM.
IT'S NO FUN ANYMORE.
HE LIKES IT.

THEY'RE RUGS
FOR MY ROOM.

I FOUND IT
IN THE BASEMENT.

YOU'RE NOT SUPPOSED TO BE
GOING DOWN THERE.

WELL, DADDY SAID
I COULD TAKE

WHATEVER I WANT
FROM DOWN THERE.
OH. WELL, ALL RIGHT.

WE LIKE TO PUT UP
A UNITED FRONT, SO FINE.

AND IF YOU SEE HIM,
COULD YOU TELL HIM
I NEED TO TALK TO HIM?
[SPITS]

OH, MY GOSH.
WHAT HAPPENED
TO YOU GUYS?

WHAT HAPPENED WAS,
ALEX GOT PINK FUR
WALLPAPER

AND WE JUST FINISHED
HANGING IT UP FOR HER.

MOM, WILL YOU
VACUUM US OFF?

HERE'S
THE CREVICE DEVICE.
BE CAREFUL.

I DON'T WANT
TO BE VACUUMED.

I'M WEARING THIS
TO SCHOOL TOMORROW.
[GIGGLES]

SO, JUSTIN,
HOW'S YOUR ROOM
COMING ALONG?
I HAVE GIRL WALLPAPER.

ARE YOU
OK WITH THAT?

NO! I GOT TO MAKE IT
A MAN'S ROOM.
I NEED MAN STUFF.
OK, LIKE WHAT?

LIKE...PICTURES OF GIRLS
ON MOTORCYCLES

AND MY FAVORITE BAND--
TEARS OF BLOOD. T.O.B.
STANDS FOR TEARS OF BLOOD.
I GOT IT.

LISTEN, THAT SOUNDS
AWESOME, AND, LIKE,

I'LL PROBABLY NOT BE
VISITING YOUR ROOM
THAT OFTEN.

BUT IF YOU WANT SOME
REAL SCARY STUFF,

DAD'S CHAIR
SHAPED LIKE
A BASEBALL GLOVE?

IT'S
IN THE BASEMENT.
OH, THAT'S AWESOME.

BASEBALL GLOVE CHAIR?
HOO-HOO!

I KNEW YOU DIDN'T
THROW IT AWAY.

CAN'T WAIT
TO SIT IN IT.

Man on Radio: AND NOW,
AT NUMBER 4,
PREVIOUSLY AT NUMBER 6,

SPONTANEOUS BLING
WITH "AW YEAH. "
[POP MUSIC PLAYING]

FLYING CARPET.
RANDOM.
OHH.

THAT'S IT, HONEY.
YOU'RE GOOD.
AHH.

FITS LIKE A
GLOVE.

TO JUSTIN'S ROOM.
BUT--
GUYS, CHECK IT OUT.

GONNA MAN UP MY ROOM,

AFTER I SMASH IT
AND HANG IT ON THE WALL.

YOU'RE NOT
SMASHING ANYTHING.
THAT'S MINE.

I USED TO PLAY IT
IN AN ALL-GIRL
MARIACHI BAND
AT LA PINATA.

[PLAYS NOTE]
OH-HOO!

I DIDN'T KNOW
YOU PLAYED THE GUITAR.

YEAH.
[PLAYS NOTE]

BUT THANKS
FOR FINDING IT.
NO, HONEY, THANK YOU.

IF YOU HADN'T

[CRASH]
ALEX?
HONEY?
ALEX?

I THOUGHT
SHE HAD THE MAGIC

OH!

HEY. SO,
HOW'S IT GOING?

YOU THINKING ABOUT

YOU KNOW YOU'RE NOT

UNSUPERVISED.

YOU SHOULD'VE
COME TO ME AS SOON AS

DIDN'T DO

IT'S NOT LIKE I WAS

YAAH! UHH.
WHOO! HA!
CAN I GO AGAIN?

THAT'S IT.
I'M TAKING

LISTEN, IF YOUR

SO DOES MY GUITAR.

ALEX, I AM REALLY

I CAN'T LET YOU KEEP

YOU DON'T EVEN KNOW

SO YOU SHOULD TEACH ME
HOW TO DRIVE THE CARPET.
NO WAY.
I CAN'T BELIEVE IT.

WHAT? NO.
IT'S NOT THAT DAY.
DADDY, PLEASE.
ABSOLUTELY NOT.

AND DON'T LOOK AT ME

AND THINK I'M
JUST GOING TO MELT
IN YOUR HANDS.

IS THAT WHAT YOU THINK
I DO, DADDY?
OK.

NO, NO, NO, NO,
NO, NO, NO.

YOU ARE NOT GOING TO
GUILT ME INTO THIS.

JUST BECAUSE
I TAUGHT JUSTIN

DOESN'T MEAN
I AUTOMATICALLY
HAVE TO--UH-OH.
YOU TAUGHT JUSTIN?

WELL, I GUESS

SINCE HE'S
YOUR FIRSTBORN

A MORE SPECIAL PLACE
IN YOUR HEART THAN ME.

OH, YOU CAN'T
POSSIBLY THINK

THAT I LOVE HIM
MORE THAN YOU.

I LOVE YOU ALL
EQUALLY,

JUST NOT
AT THE SAME TIME.

WE'LL TALK ABOUT
THIS IN THE MORNING.
GOOD NIGHT.
IT'S ONLY 4:00.

WHO ARE YOU--
FATHER TIME?

WHY I CAN'T
LEARN HOW TO FLY
THE CARPET.

YOU CAN'T FLY THE CARPET

NOT OLD ENOUGH.

I'M 16 NOW.

GOOD NIGHT.

YOU HAVEN'T GIVEN ME

I KNOW YOU MUST

THAT'S HOW MUCH
I RESPECT YOU
AND LOVE YOU.
OK. FINE.

WE'LL START CARPET FLYING
LESSONS TOMORROW.

AND THAT'S

JUST BRING IT TO YOU
EVERY 3,000 MILES

SO YOU CAN DO

AH--TRICK QUESTION.
NONE OF THEM,

BECAUSE IT'S VERY EASY

AND THEN IT STARTS

IS THAT BAD?

I'M A BIG GIRL.

CURL WHAT,

GO SLOWER.

ALL RIGHT, ENOUGH CHIT-CHAT.

YOU LEARN BY DOING.
LET'S TAKE HER UP.

HEY, ISN'T THIS FUN?
JUST THE TWO OF US.

WHY ARE YOU

EYES ON THE SKY, NOT ME.
THE SKY.

ALL RIGHT,
TURN LEFT HERE.

OH, NO.
TOO JERKY.
TOO JERKY.

IT'S ALL IN THE WRIST.
I TOLD YOU,
IT'S IN THE WRIST.
I'M BARELY TOUCHING IT.

[SIGHS] LOOK,
YOU'RE THINKING TOO MUCH.
DON'T THINK, JUST--FLY.

DON'T THINK, OK?

IF YOU'RE NOT

MAYBE I SHOULD
YELL LOUDER.

I'M JUST LOUD TEACHING.

WATCH OUT!
WATCH OUT!

WATCH WHERE?
WATCH WHERE?

WATCH EVERYWHERE!
